CustomField.formula:
IF (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "None") || ISBLANK(TEXT(Status__c)), IMAGE("/img/icon/custom51_100/chalkboard16.png", '*') & " N/A", IF(TODAY() < VaccineDueDistemper__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < VaccineDueDistemper__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Distemper Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueDistemper__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Distemper Vaccination is expired") & BR() & IF(TODAY() < VaccineDueHepatitis__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < VaccineDueHepatitis__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Hepatitis Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueHepatitis__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Hepatitis Vaccination is expired") & BR() & IF(TODAY() < VaccineDueParainfluenza__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < VaccineDueParainfluenza__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueParainfluenza__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is expired") & BR() & IF(TODAY() < VaccineDueParvovirus__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < VaccineDueParvovirus__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Parvovirus Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueParvovirus__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Parvovirus Vaccination is expired") & BR() & IF(TODAY() < VaccineDueRabies__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < VaccineDueRabies__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Rabies Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(VaccineDueRabies__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Rabies Vaccination is expired") & BR() &
IF(TODAY() < PhysicalExamDue__c, IF(TODAY() + 60 < PhysicalExamDue__c, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.gif", '*'), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.gif", '*')) & " Physical Exam is good until " & TEXT(PhysicalExamDue__c), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.gif", '*') & " Physical Exam is not up to date") )
CustomField.label: Health Care Records Status
